skill.author: DNYoussef

security_audit.summary: This is a legitimate DevOps validation tool. All 80 static findings are false positives: weak crypto patterns are keyword matches in documentation, Windows SAM database flags are .json file extensions misidentified, shell commands are standard bash scripting for deployment validation, and secret scanning is an intended security audit function. The skill operates locally with no credential exfiltration.

content.value_statement: Code often fails in production due to missed quality gates. This skill runs comprehensive pre-deployment validation including security scans, performance benchmarks, and documentation checks to catch issues before deployment.
actual_capabilities: Runs complete quality audit pipeline with theater, functionality, and style checks
Performs security deep-dive scanning for vulnerabilities and hardcoded secrets
Validates performance benchmarks against defined SLAs
Checks documentation completeness including README and deployment guides
Audits dependencies for known vulnerabilities using npm audit
Generates deployment checklist and rollback plan
limitations: Cannot modify code to fix issues it finds
Load testing requires manual execution for production environments
Performance benchmarks may be skipped for non-production environments

best_practices: Run validation before every deployment to catch issues early
Address critical and high-severity findings immediately
Use generated deployment checklist as sign-off document
anti_patterns: Deploying without reviewing the generated checklist

faq.question: Which AI tools support this skill?
faq.answer: This skill works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code for pre-deployment validation tasks.

faq.question: What quality gates must pass?
faq.answer: All tests passing, code quality ‚â•85, test coverage ‚â•80%, zero critical/high security issues.

faq.question: How does it integrate with CI/CD?
faq.answer: The skill generates deployment checklists and returns exit codes for automation pipelines.

faq.question: Is data safe?
faq.answer: All validation runs locally; only npm audit connects to public registry for vulnerability checks.

faq.question: What if performance tests fail?
faq.answer: Performance failures block production deployments but allow staging with warnings.

faq.question: How is this different from quick-quality-check?
faq.answer: Production-readiness includes security scans, dependency audits, and generates deployment checklists.
